t:type.name: PairingHelpStep
t:type.t:description: A step a user can take if they're having issues getting a device to pair.

t:attribute.name: id
t:attribute.description: The ID of the step, used for looking up images, eg 'remediation/name'.

t:attribute.name: order
t:attribute.description: The order this step occurs in.

t:attribute.name: linkText
t:attribute.description: If a link is included (such as for manufacturer instructions) this is the text to display for that link.

t:attribute.name: linkUrl
t:attribute.description: If a link is included (such as for manufacturer instructions) this is the destination for that link.
